programme.title: Adult Beginners
programme.desc: Premiere. An entrepreneur on the brink of success instead loses everything when the product he launches is a failure, prompting his friends to turn their backs on him. He retreats to the safety of his sister's home, where he is allowed to stay on the condition he helps look after her three-year-old son. Despite his haphazard attitude to childcare, he forms a close relationship with his nephew. Comedy drama, starring Nick Kroll, Rose Byrne and Bobby Cannavale

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A poor teenager leaves home and hits the road with a crew of magazine sellers. She gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love while crossing the Midwest Inuted States. Drama, starring Sasha Lane, Shia LaBeouf and Riley Keough

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence Special
programme.desc: A preview of the sci-fi sequel, which stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth, Bill Pullman and Charlotte Gainsbourg

programme.title: Cars 3: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at Pixar's latest animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson and Armie Hammer

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: Premiere. During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: Premiere. A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah

programme.title: After Love
programme.desc: Premiere. After 15 years of marriage, a couple with two children prepare to divorce. However, as the husband needs to find a new place to live, they have to cohabit, and figure out how to share their belongings. Drama, starring Berenice Bejo and Cedric Kahn

programme.title: Racing Hearts
programme.desc: Premiere. A businessman travels to a small Belgian village on an unusual assignment. A wealthy Dubai sheikh he is trying to make a deal with has a passion for pigeon racing, and wants to own a famous champion bird. As the visitor tries to persuade the breeder to part with the creature, he falls for the man's granddaughter. Romantic drama, with Jamie Dornan, Charlotte De Bruyne and Anthony Head(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: Biopic of influential country singer Hank Williams, exploring his tempestuous marriage and addiction to alcohol and painkillers. With Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond: Special
programme.desc: The making of the latest instalment in the sci-fi series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Zoe Saldana

programme.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show: Let's Do the Time Warp Again
programme.desc: A straitlaced couple, seeking shelter from a storm, find themselves in the castle of a transsexual alien scientist. Musical remake of the 1975 cult classic, starring Laverne Cox, Victoria Justice and Ryan McCartan

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: After the USS Enterprise is attacked during a rescue mission, Kirk, Spock and the crew struggle for survival on an alien planet while their mysterious assailant carries out his plans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wife's two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: After the USS Enterprise is attacked during a rescue mission, Kirk, Spock and the crew struggle for survival on an alien planet while their mysterious assailant carries out his plans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A troubled family discovers there is every reason to be afraid of the dark when they come face to face with an entity. Supernatural horror, starring Teresa Palmer, Gabriel Bateman and Maria Bello

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A journalist lives her life by her father's maxim that monogamy never works, and has spent her adult life enjoying freedom from commitment. When she is sent to interview a doctor, an attraction develops between them, and she begins to wonder if there mighty be something to be said for a stable relationship. Comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Bill Hader, Brie Larson and Tilda Swinton

programme.title: Sister Act

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: Spaceman
programme.desc: Premiere. Biopic of baseball player Bill `Spaceman' Lee, whose maverick ways cause problems with the Montreal Expos. Starring Josh Duhamel, Ernie Hudson and W Earl Brown

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence Special
programme.desc: A preview of the sci-fi sequel, which stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth, Bill Pullman and Charlotte Gainsbourg

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc: A journalist leaves behind her sheltered life in New York to report from the front line in Afghanistan. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Tina Fey and Margot Robbie

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Premiere. A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts

programme.title: Tiger Raid
programme.desc: While on a covert mission, two cold-blooded mercenaries form an unlikely bond as they race across the desert in the dead of night. Action thriller, starring Damien Molony and Sofia Boutella(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As hobbits Frodo and Sam near the end of their journey into the dark lands of Mordor to destroy the One Ring, the evil Sauron unleashes the full might of his armies on Middle-earth. Meanwhile, Aragorn must fulfil his destiny of becoming king by leading his people into a climactic battle with the forces of darkness. Conclusion of the fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen and Sean Astin(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis(n)

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Wisecracking Detroit detective Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles to investigate the shooting of an old friend, and uncovers a connection with a spate of violent robberies carried out by a criminal who leaves a mysterious calling card. Comedy thriller sequel, with Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Brigitte Nielsen

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Maverick cop Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles when an investigation into a colleague's murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He enlists the help of old ally Rosewood to prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Theresa Randle and Bronson Pinchot

programme.title: Licence to Drive
programme.desc: A teenager promises the girl of his dreams he will take her out in his grandfather's treasured vintage car, even though he has just failed his driving test - leading to a whole host of mishaps and scrapes. Comedy, starring Corey Haim, Corey Feldman, Carol Kane and Heather Graham

programme.title: The Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: Inept police detective Frank Drebin plans to retire from the force, but is lured back by the opportunity to foil a terrorist plot. Going undercover in prison, he sets out to prevent an evil mastermind from escaping and carrying out his fiendish plan - to bomb the Oscar awards ceremony. Comedy sequel, starring Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley, OJ Simpson, George Kennedy and Fred Ward

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: A Californian detective investigating the murder of a local man by drug smugglers has only one witness to help him solve the case - the large, smelly dog that belonged to the victim, which is about to turn the detective's well-ordered existence into chaos. Family comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham and Craig T Nelson

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: A recently divorced bookshop owner finds love with a glamorous Hollywood film star, but ends up the focus of unwanted media interest - which makes maintaining a relationship a tricky proposition. Romantic comedy written by Richard Curtis, starring Hugh Grant, Julia Roberts, Rhys Ifans, Emma Chambers, James Dreyfus and Gina McKee

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Two sisters have little in common - one is a financially irresponsible flirt and the other is a mature and staid lawyer. However, the pair are brought together when a dark family secret comes to light. Curtis Hanson's comedy drama, based on a novel by Jennifer Weiner, starring Cameron Diaz, Toni Collette and Shirley MacLaine

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters are reunited when their parents decide to sell the house they grew up in. They return to the family home to clear out their childhood bedrooms, but with their parents away, seize the chance to relive their teenage years and throw one last wild house party. Comedy, starring Amy Poehler, Tina Fey and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish

programme.title: The Bad Education Movie
programme.desc: Incompetent teacher Alfie Wickers decides his students deserve a treat for somehow passing their GCSEs, so decides to take them on the greatest school trip of their lives - to Cornwall. However, a series of disasters leaves the class into trouble with suspicious locals. Comedy, starring Jack Whitehall, Harry Enfield and Iain Glen

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: A family gather to bury the patriarch, but any dignity to the occasion soon disappears in a run of disasters. The deceased's oldest son resents the success of his younger brother, while their sister's boyfriend has accidentally taken LSD and an unexpected guest has a few shock revelations to make. Comedy, with Chris Rock, Martin Lawrence, Zoe Saldana and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: The Benchwarmers
programme.desc: Three losers who have been pushed around all their lives decide to finally stand up for themselves and rebuild their self-esteem. With the backing of a millionaire, they form their own baseball team and take part in a tournament - in which all the other competitors are children. Sporting comedy, starring Rob Schneider, Jon Heder, David Spade and Jon Lovitz

programme.title: The Grass Is Greener
programme.desc: An English earl is forced to open his stately home to the public to avoid going broke. When one of the tourists, an American tycoon, takes an interest in his wife, the peer enlists the aid of an old flame to save his marriage. Romantic comedy, starring Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Robert Mitchum and Jean Simmons

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Lost in Karastan
programme.desc: A director struggling with personal and professional crises attends a film festival in a newly-formed republic, and accepts an offer from the country's dictator to make a film about one of their national heroes. The shoot soon descends into chaos when his leading man goes missing and his benefactor is overthrown in a military coup. Comedy, starring Matthew Macfadyen, MyAnna Buring and Noah Taylor

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: An American police college lowers its entrance requirements in the hope of attracting new recruits, and in response, assorted dubious candidates turn up for enrolment. A short-tempered instructor is determined to weed out the bad apples, but a riot provides the clueless cops with a chance to prove their worth. Comedy, starring Steve Guttenberg, Kim Cattrall, Bubba Smith and GW Bailey

programme.title: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People
programme.desc: A self-promoting writer is offered a position on the staff of a New York fashion magazine thanks to his irreverent views on the world of celebrity. However, he soon discovers his opinions render him incapable of relating to the superficial personalities he is expected to work with, not to mention his egotistical boss. Comedy based on Toby Young's memoirs, starring Simon Pegg, Kirsten Dunst, Jeff Bridges, Megan Fox and Gillian Anderson

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When a series of supernatural disturbances occur in New York city, a quartet of investigators and their dim assistant investigate. Reboot of the 1980s comedy franchise, starring Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: An uptight, accident prone police officer desperate to prove herself has to protect a gangster's widow who has agreed to give evidence against a drug lord. They end up forced to go on the run together, and are pursued across Texas by hitmen and corrupt cops. Crime comedy, starring Reese Witherspoon and Sofia Vergara

programme.title: Barbershop: A Fresh Cut
programme.desc: As their surrounding community has taken a turn for the worse, the crew at Calvin's Barbershop come together to bring some much-needed change to their neighbourhood. Comedy, starring Ice Cube, Cedric the Entertainer and Regina Hall

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Family man Rusty Griswold spent his childhood family holidays stumbling from one disaster to another with his hapless father. He is determined that his own road trip with his wife and kids will go better - but soon finds the apple has not fallen far from the tree. Sequel to the 1980s comedy series, starring Ed Helms and Christina Applegate, with Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo reprising their roles

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When a series of supernatural disturbances occur in New York city, a quartet of investigators and their dim assistant investigate. Reboot of the 1980s comedy franchise, starring Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth

programme.title: Barbershop: A Fresh Cut
programme.desc: As their surrounding community has taken a turn for the worse, the crew at Calvin's Barbershop come together to bring some much-needed change to their neighbourhood. Comedy, starring Ice Cube, Cedric the Entertainer and Regina Hall

programme.title: Ali G Indahouse
programme.desc: Scheming politicians try to manipulate the unwitting Ali G into bringing about the downfall of the prime minister - but fail to appreciate that his streetwise attitude could give the government much-needed street cred. Comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Michael Gambon, Charles Dance, Kellie Bright, Martin Freeman and Rhona Mitra(n)

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his gang of daredevil friends bring the MTV series to the big screen. As usual, they perform a variety of weird and wonderful stunts, including crawling across dozens of mousetraps while wearing rodent make-up, and being rolled down bowling lanes on skateboards. Comedy, with Bam Margera, Henry Rollins, Spike Jonze and Tony Hawk(n)

programme.title: Top Secret
programme.desc: A rock 'n' roll singer goes on tour in East Germany in the 1950s, where a scientist's daughter draws him into the world of international espionage through a French underground movement seeking to foil a Nazi plan to take over the world. Comedy, spoofing Second World War spy thrillers and Elvis movies, starring Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge and Omar Sharif(n)

programme.title: Trapped in Paradise
programme.desc: Three bungling brothers manage to pull off a major robbery in a backwoods community on Christmas Eve, but the unwitting locals make them feel so welcome they find it impossible to leave town, leaving the crooks facing a crisis of conscience. Offbeat comedy, starring Nicolas Cage, Dana Carvey, Jon Lovitz and Madchen Amick(n)

programme.title: Rock the Kasbah
programme.desc: A has-been rock manager is left stranded in war-torn Kabul after his last remaining client abandons him. He meets a local teenager who has dreams of becoming a pop star, and tries to make her the first female contestant on a TV talent show, assisted by a prostitute, a mercenary and a couple of war profiteers. Comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Leem Lubany, Bruce Willis, Kate Hudson and Zooey Deschanel(n)

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan(n)

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: A man and a woman with different attitudes to life meet by chance and develop a close and long-lasting friendship. But over time, a mutual sexual attraction begins to develop and threatens to ruin their relationship - raising the question whether men and women can ever really be just friends. Romantic comedy, starring Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Ambitious journalist Alison's one-night stand with directionless layabout Ben has unexpected consequences when she discovers she is pregnant. However, the unlikely parents decide to give the relationship a try for their baby's sake, forcing Ben to face the challenge of accepting responsibility for the first time in his life. Romantic comedy, starring Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl and Paul Rudd(n)

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
programme.desc: A highly paid executive loses everything after his corrupt boss's false accounting ruins the firm and leaves him to take the blame. Flat-broke and with no income or savings to maintain his lavish lifestyle, he and his wife decide the only way to support themselves is to turn to crime. Remake of the 1976 comedy, with Jim Carrey, Tea Leoni, Alec Baldwin and Richard Jenkins(n)

programme.title: Zoolander 2
programme.desc: A dim-witted supermodel must step back into the spotlight and save the day when someone starts murdering pop stars. Comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller and Owen Wilson(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Ambitious journalist Alison's one-night stand with directionless layabout Ben has unexpected consequences when she discovers she is pregnant. However, the unlikely parents decide to give the relationship a try for their baby's sake, forcing Ben to face the challenge of accepting responsibility for the first time in his life. Romantic comedy, starring Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl and Paul Rudd(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safe-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: A Roman commander is posted to Britain in the last days of the empire and given a final mission to rescue a high-ranking official and his son stranded in the north. However, the endeavour reveals his true destiny is to lead the Britons against the new Saxon invasion, and marks the start of a legend. Historical adventure, starring Clive Owen, Keira Knightley, Ray Winstone, Ioan Gruffudd and Stephen Dillane

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Philadelphia boxer Rocky Balboa quits the ring to marry his sweetheart and become a father. However, times prove hard and money is tight, so when Balboa is offered another shot at Apollo Creed's heavyweight title, the fighter is lured out of retirement. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers, Burt Young and Burgess Meredith

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safe-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook double-crosses his partners in crime, a betrayal that leaves their friend and mentor dead. One year later, they regroup and come up with a daring plan to exact revenge on the traitor and reclaim their ill-gotten gains. Crime thriller inspired by the 1969 movie, starring Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Edward Norton, Seth Green and Donald Sutherland

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: FBI agent Sean Archer captures terrorist Castor Troy, the man who killed his son. While Troy is in a coma, Archer has the crook's face surgically grafted onto his own so he can go undercover and locate a bomb planted somewhere in Los Angeles. But then Troy regains consciousness - and in turn takes on Archer's identity. John Woo's action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Travolta, Joan Allen, Gina Gershon and Dominique Swain

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: A vampire fights a war against werewolves that has raged for centuries, with the human race oblivious to the conflict. She falls in love with a mortal man who has wandered unwittingly into the midst of a conflict, and must protect him from both the enemy, who have plans for him, and her own side. Supernatural action thriller, starring Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Michael Sheen and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: The leader of a gang of bandits enslaves all the men from a Mexican village while maddened with grief over the death of his son. However, one of his hostages is a survivor from the original team of gunfighters, and his wife persuades his two remaining companions to form a new band of heroes and mount a rescue mission. Western sequel, starring Yul Brynner, Robert Fuller and Warren Oates

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: A military officer is sent to Iraq after the downfall of Saddam Hussein on a mission to find the weapons of mass destruction that were used to justify the invasion - only to be warned by a CIA agent that no such devices exist. As he continues his fruitless search, he discovers evidence of a political conspiracy. Paul Greengrass's thriller, starring Matt Damon, Greg Kinnear and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: A grieving widower is shocked when his wife's killers manage to evade justice, so he seeks the aid of an old friend in taking the law into his own hands. However, as he hunts down the murderers, he discovers they have friends in very high places. Crime thriller, starring John Travolta and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The amnesiac assassin is living quietly in hiding, until his former employers come after him again and murder his girlfriend. A CIA operation has ended in disaster, and those responsible intend to clear their names by implicating Bourne. As the former secret agent tries to evade the hitmen on his trail, he also struggles to piece together the truth about his past. Action thriller sequel, starring Matt Damon, Brian Cox, Joan Allen and Julia Stiles

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Three highly skilled fighter pilots are less than thrilled when a new computer with artificial intelligence is brought in to assist in flying a state-of-the-art jet. However, the trio are left to pick up the pieces when the machine is struck by lightning and begins to malfunction, leading to a chaotic battle to stop the jet from starting an all-out war. Action adventure, starring Jamie Foxx, Jessica Biel and Josh Lucas

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: World heavyweight boxing champion Rocky Balboa settles down into a life of luxury - but a cloud appears on the horizon in the shape of ambitious contender Clubber Lang, whose brutal fighting style represents a serious threat to his title. Drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Mr T, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers and Hulk Hogan

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: A military officer is sent to Iraq after the downfall of Saddam Hussein on a mission to find the weapons of mass destruction that were used to justify the invasion - only to be warned by a CIA agent that no such devices exist. As he continues his fruitless search, he discovers evidence of a political conspiracy. Paul Greengrass's thriller, starring Matt Damon, Greg Kinnear and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Armageddon

Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy

A CIA operation has ended in disaster, and those responsible intend to clear their names by implicating Bourne. As the former secret agent tries to evade the hitmen on his trail, he also struggles to piece together the truth about his past. Action thriller sequel, starring Matt Damon, Brian Cox, Joan Allen and Julia Stiles

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: Vampire warrior Selene and her lover, a hybrid creature, must flee for their lives from the eldest of her kind. The ancient bloodsucker plans to find and release his imprisoned brother, the first ever werewolf, but Selene knows the creature will simply destroy everything in its path and must fight to destroy both of them. Action fantasy sequel, starring Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman and Derek Jacobi(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson(n)

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Secret agents suspect there is a traitor in their organisation when their latest assignment ends in disaster. The sole survivor is accused of being the mole, forcing him to go on the run to clear his name. However, in the process, he discovers a former Russian spy is selling information about the world's leading undercover operatives. Action thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Ving Rhames(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: The Italian Stallion agrees to help former champion Apollo Creed train for a match against a seemingly invincible boxer from the Soviet Union, only to see his friend die as a result of injuries sustained in the fight. Rocky vows to avenge him, and prepares to take on the Russian heavyweight in his own country. Drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Dolph Lundgren, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers and Brigitte Nielsen(n)

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Secret agents suspect there is a traitor in their organisation when their latest assignment ends in disaster. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney(n)

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The masked hero returns to face the Penguin, a grotesque crime boss dwelling in the sewers who conspires with a corrupt businessman to make himself mayor. When the tycoon tries to kill his secretary, she returns as vengeful vigilante Catwoman, who soon forms an intense relationship with the dark knight in both their costumed and real identities. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito and Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The masked crimefighter takes on the twin threats of disfigured maniac Two-Face and insane genius the Riddler, who are plotting to control the brains of the entire world. Meanwhile, an acrobat whose family has been murdered by Two-Face steps up to join Batman in his fight against evil. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Nicole Kidman, Jim Carrey and Chris O'Donnell

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick take on the villainous Mr Freeze, who plans to destroy Gotham City with an icy doomsday weapon unless his demands are met. The dynamic duo also have to contend with femme fatale Poison Ivy, who is determined to drive a wedge between them. Comic-book adventure, starring George Clooney, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Uma Thurman and Chris O'Donnell

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In the sequel to Batman Begins, the masked hero finds a new ally in his war on organised crime in Gotham's crusading new district attorney, Harvey Dent. However, both men are pushed to their limits by the rise of the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos and destruction throughout the city for his own amusement. Comic-book thriller, starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and an Oscar-winning Heath Ledger

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A ragtag team of gifted villains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn and Killer Croc, are strong-armed into doing good by a no-nonsense government agent. Fantasy adventure, starring Will Smith, Margot Robbie and Jared Leto

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: A computer hacker discovers the world around him is nothing more than a virtual-reality fantasy created by malevolent living machines. Entering the devastated real world, he joins freedom fighters risking their lives to bring the truth out into the open and liberate the human race. Sci-fi action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss and Hugo Weaving

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bay's sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes battle more bad guys when Shredder breaks out of custody and teams up with the villainous Krang. Action comedy sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Laura Linney

programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley(n)

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Scientists create a futuristic police state, but political assassinations and corruption provoke an acrobatic rebel agent to seek revenge on those in charge. Sci-fi martial arts thriller, based on the animated series, with Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Frances McDormand, Jonny Lee Miller and Sophie Okonedo(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger(n)

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: As the machines threaten the last refuge of humanity, a party of freedom fighters journeys into the virtual world of the Matrix to find a means to end the war once and for all. However, the computer programme Agent Smith, once a tool of the machines, has returned from the dead with his own plans for the world. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne and Hugo Weaving(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox(n)

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson(n)

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: As the machines threaten the last refuge of humanity, a party of freedom fighters journeys into the virtual world of the Matrix to find a means to end the war once and for all. However, the computer programme Agent Smith, once a tool of the machines, has returned from the dead with his own plans for the world. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox(n)

Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: The owners of a cat and two dogs leave their pets with a friend in a remote area of Canada while they take a holiday abroad. When the minder embarks on a hunting trip, the three animals find themselves unattended and set out on a hazardous journey through the wilderness to get back home. Disney adventure, starring Emile Genest and John Drainie

programme.title: The Watcher in the Woods
programme.desc: Two sisters are haunted by a ghost when they and their American family move into an old mansion set deep in an English forest. As the spirit makes more and more contact with them, the girls come to realise that the spirit is the ghost of the owner's child who went missing long ago. Thriller, starring Bette Davis, Carroll Baker, David McCallum and Lynn-Holly Johnson

programme.title: The Gnome-Mobile
programme.desc: An eccentric millionaire, along with his niece and nephew, finds two gnomes whose homes have been destroyed. They decide to help them find the rest of the tribe, but the family's friends think the tiny creatures are a figment of their imagination. Children's fantasy, starring Walter Brennan, Matthew Garber and Karen Dotrice

programme.title: The Love Bug
programme.desc: Herbie, an irrepressible Beetle car with a mind of its own, takes a shine to a struggling racing driver and leads him to victory on the track. However, his success attracts the attention of an unscrupulous rival competitor, who will go to any lengths to win the most important race of all. Disney comedy, starring Dean Jones, Michele Lee, Buddy Hackett and David Tomlinson

programme.title: Pocahontas
programme.desc: A Native American princess falls in love with an English settler, but her father is distrustful of the Europeans - not without just cause, as a cruel governor is prepared to wage war to get his hands on the gold he believes they are hiding. Disney animated drama, with the voices of Irene Bedard, Mel Gibson and Christian Bale

programme.title: Piper
programme.desc: Animated Pixar short, directed by Alan Barillaro. A mother bird tries to teach her little one how to find food for herself, but encounters a traumatic experience

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson

programme.title: Presto
programme.desc: Animated short comedy from Pixar about a magician preparing for a performance who once again forgets to feed his rabbit before going on stage. However, the animal has had enough of going hungry and plots to ruin the show. Directed and voiced by Doug Sweetland

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan

programme.title: Pocahontas
programme.desc: A Native American princess falls in love with an English settler, but her father is distrustful of the Europeans - not without just cause, as a cruel governor is prepared to wage war to get his hands on the gold he believes they are hiding. Disney animated drama, with the voices of Irene Bedard, Mel Gibson and Christian Bale

programme.title: Pocahontas II: Journey to a New World
programme.desc: The Native American princess travels to England on a diplomatic quest to broker peace between the two nations - but faces fierce opposition from the devious Governor Ratcliffe. Disney animated adventure sequel, featuring the voices of Irene Bedard, Jim Cummings, Donal Gibson and Judy Kuhn

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson

programme.title: Riley's First Date
programme.desc: Emotions run high when a boy shows up at the front door asking for Riley. Pixar short featuring the characters from Oscar-winning animation Inside Out, with the voices of Kyle MacLachlan, Diane Lane and Kaitlyn Dias

programme.title: Lava
programme.desc: James Ford Murphy's musical short following the love story of two ocean volcanoes, Uku and Lele, over millions of years. Animation, featuring the voices of Kuana Torres Kahele and Napua Makua

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: The swashbuckling rogues join forces with old foe Barbossa to take on villainous Lord Beckett. But first they have to journey to the ends of the Earth to free Captain Jack Sparrow from his hellish imprisonment in Davy Jones' Locker. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley and Chow Yun-Fat, and featuring a cameo appearance by Keith Richards

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: A bumbling, short-sighted senior citizen unwittingly ends up in the possession of a valuable jewel during a mix-up at a museum exhibition, and is blissfully unaware that a Brazilian crime lord, a female cat burglar and the FBI are on his tail. Comedy based on the cartoon series, starring Leslie Nielsen, Kelly Lynch, Malcolm McDowell, Ernie Hudson and Jennifer Garner

programme.title: Rascal
programme.desc: A boy growing up in Wisconsin is frequently left alone following his mother's death, as his travelling salesman father spends most of the time away from home. The youngster comes across a baby raccoon that has been abandoned by its family, and the animal becomes his constant companion. Fact-based family drama, starring Bill Mumy and Steve Forrest

programme.title: The Absent-Minded Professor
programme.desc: An eccentric inventor creates a lighter-than-air substance and uses it to make his car fly, attracting the attention of an unscrupulous spy ring. Disney fantasy comedy, starring Fred MacMurray, Tommy Kirk and Nancy Olson

programme.title: In Search of the Castaways
programme.desc: The two children of a missing sea captain receive a message in a bottle that convinces them their father is still alive. Enlisting an eccentric French professor to help them find him, they embark on round-the-world journey and face natural disasters and mutineers during the voyage. Children's adventure based on a novel by Jules Verne, starring Maurice Chevalier, Hayley Mills and George Sanders

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the Disney animation, in which Copper the dog joins a country music band of strays. However, his taste of fame leads him to neglect old friend Tod the fox. With the voices of Patrick Swayze, Reba McEntire, Harrison Fahn and Jonah Bobo

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: A mad scientist kidnaps a beagle to use as a guinea pig in his deranged experiments. But an accidental injection leaves the mutt with awe-inspiring superpowers, which he uses to foil the deranged inventor's plans to take over a city. Comedy adventure, starring Peter Dinklage and James Belushi, and featuring the voices of Jason Lee and Amy Adams

programme.title: Zootropolis
programme.desc: In a city populated by animals, a rabbit achieves her dream of becoming the first bunny to become a police officer - but faces prejudice at every turn. When the disappearance of an otter hints at a terrible conspiracy in the city, she enlists the aid of a con-artist fox in solving the mystery. Disney animated comedy, with the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman and Idris Elba

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith

programme.title: Pooh's Grand Adventure: The Search for Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Christopher Robin starts school and leaves a note for Winnie the Pooh explaining why he will not be around any more. However, the bear misunderstands the message and becomes convinced his friend is in grave danger, organising the other animals into a rescue attempt. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and John Fiedler

programme.title: Underdog

programme.title: The Finest Hours
programme.desc: An oil tanker suffers devastating damage while caught in a fierce Atlantic storm, which breaks the vessel in two. While an engineer tries to keep the crew members trapped in the sinking wreckage alive, members of the Coast Guard brave the deadly conditions to come to their rescue. Fact-based disaster movie, starring Chris Pine, Casey Affleck and Eric Bana

programme.title: My Favorite Martian
programme.desc: A TV journalist meets a stranded alien who is trying to repair his crashed spacecraft. After first planning to exploit the chance of a big story, he instead offers his help after befriending the visitor - but a fellow reporter plans to expose the truth. Sci-fi comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Christopher Lloyd, Jeff Daniels, Elizabeth Hurley and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: The Shaggy DA
programme.desc: A boy who once turned into a dog grows up to become a principled lawyer, who runs for district attorney. However, as he campaigns against the crooked current DA, he finds himself once again undergoing a canine transformation and must find out the cause while keeping his condition a secret. Sequel to Disney comedy The Shaggy Dog, starring Dean Jones and Suzanne Pleshette

programme.title: The Strongest Man in the World
programme.desc: A student and his friends discover a formula that, when mixed with breakfast cereal, gives them superhuman strength. However, it is not long before their breakthrough is noticed by the criminal fraternity and a motley assortment of crooks are after the secret. Disney comedy, starring Kurt Russell, Eve Arden, Joe Flynn, Cesar Romero and Phil Silvers(n)

Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and John Fiedler(n)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: A rat finds his love of fine food has made him an outcast to his less discerning family. Separated from his fellow rodents by a storm, he winds up in a famous French restaurant, where he helps an incompetent kitchen assistant become the greatest chef in Paris. Pixar animated comedy from the director of The Incredibles, with the voices of Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano and Peter O'Toole(n)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush(n)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs(n)

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Battle of Gods
programme.desc: A team of super-powered warriors who once saved Earth reunites to face a new threat. An ancient god of destruction awakens and seeks them out in search of a new challenge. The leader of the band of heroes must find a way to increase his own powers to match his enemy in battle. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Sean Schemmel and Jason Douglas

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse

programme.title: Survive the Serengeti: Against the Wild 2
programme.desc: When their plane crash-lands in the African bush, two bickering siblings find themselves force to rely on their wits - and their courageous dog - to help them conquer their fears and survive. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis

programme.title: Throne of Elves
programme.desc: In the mythical realm of Altera, young hero Lambert is drawn into a bitter conflict between elf princess Liya and her malevolent rival, Elena. Epic animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Ashley Boettcher and GK Bowes

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: Bankruptcy forces the Carraclough family to sell their devoted pet to a mean-spirited duke and his wife. But, when the well-to-do couple move away, Lassie pines for her first home and decides to track down her former owners. Family adventure, starring Peter O'Toole, Samantha Morton, John Lynch, Peter Dinklage, Steve Pemberton and Nicholas Lyndhurst

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: Sky Movies takes a special look at Pixar's animated prehistoric adventure

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail
programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. He meets a magical white wolf, who leads him on a journey in search of a magician who can help them find a powerful warrior - but many danger's lie between them and the sorcerer's mountain home. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Milla Jovovich, Whoopi Goldberg and Sharon Stone

programme.title: Cars 3: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at Pixar's latest animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson and Armie Hammer

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha

Romantic drama, starring Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas and Kerry Washington(n)

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan

Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverend's daughter. Musical remake, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid(n)

programme.title: Inside Out: Special
programme.desc: The making of the Pixar animation, taking viewers inside the mind of a youngster as she copes with the emotional upheaval of moving to a new town and new school(n)

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed(n)

programme.title: An Eskimo Tale
programme.desc: When animals start mysteriously disappearing, three young Inuits embark on a perilous journey to save their tribe from ruin. Animated adventure, with the voice of Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth(n)

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan(n)
